tika-abh08t19:3: 1266-8.Uppajjato uppajjantassa nāmarūpadhammassa rāsito nicayato āgamanañca natthi. Disāgamananti disāya gamanaṃ . Niruddhassāpi nāmarūpadhammassa ekasmiṃ ṭhāne nicayoti ca natthi.
tika-abh08t19:4: 1270-1. Avijjāsamudayā rūpasamudayo, avijjānirodhā rūpanirodho. Taṇhāsamudayā rūpasamudayo, taṇhānirodhā rūpanirodho. Kammasamudayā rūpasamudayo, kammanirodhā rūpanirodho. Āhāranirodhā rūpanirodho. Dhammeti saṅkhāradhamme.
tika-abh08t19:5: 1280.Sampattapaṭivedhassāti sampattalokuttarasaṅkhātamaggaphalassa sotāpannādipuggalassa. Vippaṭipannassāti paṭipattiyaṃ appaṭipannassa, viruddhavasena paṭipannassa vā.
tika-abh08t19:7: 1290.Yato yato paccayādito. Yaṃ amataṃ nibbānaṃ vijānataṃ vijānantānaṃ pītipāmojjaṃ, tehi labhitabbaṃ amataṃ, amataṃ viya pītipāmojjaṃ vā.
tika-abh08t19:8: 1293.Appatteti attani maggaphalasmiṃ appatte. Pattasaññīti maggaphale ahaṃ patto asmi iti saññito hoti.
tika-abh08t19:9: 1297.Sāravedinoti sārajānanasīlā. Tanti taṃ maggāmaggañāṇadassanaṃ. Idaṃ ñāṇaṃ maggāmaggañāṇadassananti maggāmaggañāṇadassanaṃ nāma.
